activities: Tate & Lyle Americas LLC will use and otherwise process personally identifiable information from the EU about employees for purposes of: workflow management, such as assigning, managing, and administering projects; compensation, including stock plan administration and compensation analysis; payroll processing; performance management; succession planning; benefits and personnel administration, such as: health and medical benefits, leave entitlements, bonuses and pensions; IT service desk and support services; monitoring and enforcing compliance with company policies and procedures; and statutory reporting.
